About us

The Beginnings of Our School: In 1998, our school began with just a few classes. It developed into the busy campus you see today over time. Our school is an excellent place to learn because of the collaborative efforts of our principal, teachers, and staff. Where We Are: Situated in Gikondo, our school is in the center of Kigali (Rwanda.)

Our mission

We empower students to excel academically, socially, and mentally in a supportive community. Through a love of learning and respect for diversity, we prepare them for success in a changing world. Encouraging active participation, we foster responsible individuals who contribute positively to society.

Our principles

At Groupe Scolaire Consulaire de Kigali, we prioritize exploratory education, logical thinking, and holistic development. Our innovative teaching methods foster creativity, teamwork, and problem-solving skills, catering to diverse learning styles. Within our supportive environment, students feel valued, challenged, and free to explore their interests.
